title: Featured Face
content:
What was the name of the yummy bold script typeface that was Featured Face a week or two ago? And, is there any kind of archive for previous Featured Faces?  
/F

 [‹ Germano Facetti, 1926-2006](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929121920/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19230 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font shape distorted in Microsoft Word - any suggestions? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929121920/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49391 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Fredrik

comments.content:
Hi Fredrik,  
 [Comalle](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929121920/http:/typophile.com/node/48379)?  
Not [Sloop](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929121920/http:/typophile.com/node/48073), is it?

<cite>And, is there any kind of archive for previous Featured Faces?</cite>  
I don’t think so. But you can [always run a search](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929121920/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com%20featured%20face), of course.  
F
